hooks.command:
npx tsc --noEmit --pretty false 2>&1 | head -20 || echo '
⚠️  TypeScript errors detected - fix before continuing'
hooks.description: Run TypeScript compiler after every file edit to catch type errors immediately

hooks.command:
npm test -- --findRelatedTests $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS --passWithNoTests --silent 2>&1 | tail -10 || echo '
⚠️  Tests failed - fix before continuing'
hooks.description: Run tests for changed files after every edit to catch logic errors immediately
Validate project context has required sections
Validate implementation plan structure and test specifications

hooks.command: echo '✅ Phase implementation complete. Running architectural review...'
hooks.description: Notify that executor finished and checker will start
